analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#204) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#302-338)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#416-438)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#509-524)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#531-546)
	- revokeTokenGrant (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#861-884)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#609-616) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#350-368):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#365)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#366)

Reentrancy in MiniMeIrrVesDivToken.claimDividend (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#1106-1123):
	External calls:
	- balance = super.balanceOfAt(msg.sender,dividend.blockNumber) (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#1113-1114)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- dividends (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#1115-1116)
	- dividends (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#1116-1117)

Reentrancy in MiniMeIrrVesDivToken.recycleDividend (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#1141-1153):
	External calls:
	- currentSupply = super.totalSupplyAt(block.number) (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#1151-1153)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- dividends (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#640-656) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#654-655)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#577) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#619-621)

MiniMeIrrevocableVestedToken.calculateVestedTokens.vestedTokens (local variable @ /unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#959-974) shadows:

Reentrancy in MiniMeIrrVesDivToken.depositDividend (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#1091-1106):
	External calls:
	- currentSupply = super.totalSupplyAt(block.number) (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#1092-1096)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- dividends (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#1098-1100)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#609-616)
	- /unique_chucks/5/0x5e365a320779acc2c72f5dcd2ba8a81e4a34569f.sol#612-615
